example.name: autogen1
example.text: Zurich-based magazine Bilanz lists Mr. Rey as having a fortune of about 1.5 billion Swiss francs .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the fortunes of a close-knit team of young , high-flying dealers , hired for their particular blend of style , genius and energy
